Key Match Events: Landry Shamet left the game with a serious shoulder injury in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The injury to Shamet is a significant blow to the Knicks' bench
The team will likely have to try to replace him on the active roster and potentially his spot in the rotation
Miscellaneous Highlights: TJ Warren is a strong candidate to replace Shamet on the regular season roster
The injury gives Warren an opportunity to crack a spot in the rotation
Others: The Knicks can also hold onto Shamet's contract while he rehabs and have him stay on the regular season roster
However, it is unclear if they are willing to do that as this would leave them very shorthanded on the bench
